requests.title: Looking for an intro to Richard Branson, Tony Hsieh, or Bill Gates
requests.details:
The U.Lab participants at Impact Hub MSP recently got together to try and distill down some of the complex components and definitions in theory U into a bite size one(ish) page document. They're happy to invite others to contribute if you would like or use as a reference if you find it useful. 

Access it using the link below or let me know if you have trouble getting access. 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wQy_jVMXeXFHmPk4nhX5TRSp5hEL-_gbMPQnJZUxBTU/edit?usp=sharing

requests.title: Batou's been putting organic oil in the Tachikomas again!

offers.title: I've got a lovely bunch of coconuts
offers.details: There they are, all standing in a row. Big ones, small ones, some as big as your head

offers.title: I'd like to install Hylo iOS app on all iPhones we have in our team to beta test the features.
offers.details: I implemented a crash analytics and I will be able to see all crashes on a dashboard online (if there will be any) and I could fix all the bugs faster that way.

conversations.title: Hylo: bug reports, feature requests, and general
conversations.details: Core Intention: Let's work together to make this thing amazing.

conversations.title: Could you please post the recipe for your magic supplements?
